name: MASAYOSHI
description:
A game by fil and pawnis

WARNING: Contains BLOOD and complete EPICNESS

Battle spirits. Try to rediscover honor.

In MASAYOSHI, you fight as what's left of a samurai. Reach the village shrine and restore justice and honor... if you can.

Features:

- Fast paced combat

- Punchy FX

- Tight parry-based system against challenging enemies

- HP-based ability economy

- Smooth and snappy animations

- Final boss with designer combos

- Original dynamic music

Made for:

Mini Jam 110: Sacrifice

Limitation: Failure is inevitable. To rediscover honor means you have lost it. Can honor truly always be regained?

Our Discord server: https://discord.gg/BjDYa6fm
